thread.title: After Samjhawaan and Ik Kudi, Alia Bhatt sings for Badrinath Ki Dulhania
thread.title_full: After Samjhawaan and Ik Kudi, Alia Bhatt sings for Badrinath Ki Dulhania

author: Snehal Rajani
title: After Samjhawaan and Ik Kudi, Alia Bhatt sings for Badrinath Ki Dulhania
text:
After Samjhawaan and Ik Kudi… After Samjhawaan and Ik Kudi, Alia Bhatt sings for Badrinath Ki Dulhania Varun Dhawan just confirmed that Alia Bhatt has sung a song in Badrinath Ki Dulhania too By Snehal Rajani | Published: March 2, 2017 8:08 pm Badrinath ki Dulhania promotions: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan look all set for a prom night 
For those who have been eagerly waiting for Alia Bhatt to take on the mic again, here’s great news. The actress has sung a song in her next movie, Badrinath Ki Dulhania, which will be out on March 10, 2017. Alia and Varun held a LIVE session on Facebook today where Varun confirmed that Alia has sung a song for Badrinath Ki Dulhania. “She has sung a song in this film and after a long time she has sung well,” he said jokingly. However, they have not revealed the name of the song yet. The last time that Alia went behind the mic, was for Udta Punjab. However, it was with Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania that Alia had sung for the first time. She crooned Samjhaawan and everyone sat up and took notice of her melodious voice. She does have a beautiful voice, no? And now that Varun has revealed that she has sung for their next film too, we cannot wait to hear it! Talking about their film, Varun said, “Humpty did so well, we wanted this one to do better.. not better but more than that we wanted it to do well.” (ALSO READ: What happened when Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan bumped into Sonakshi Sinha? ) 
Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan are going to many states and various TV shows, to promote their film Badrinath Ki Dulhania on all platforms. Talking about their film, the trailer has got great reviews and the songs are already a hit, especially Humsafar and Tamma Tamma. Another song from the movie will be out tomorrow is titled Roke Na Ruke Naina which has been sung by Arijit Singh. Amaal Malik has composed this heartbreak song from Badrinath Ki Dulhania. 
For all those who have been wondering if Badrinath Ki Dulhania is a sequel to Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania, you have got it wrong. The director of the film, Shashank Khaitan, has himself refuted the claims recently.
